title: The After Show Talks About the Early Days of RoMa Craft Tobac
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About the Early Days of RoMa Craft Tobac
description:
This week, Jonathan found an old interview with Skip Martin and Mike Rosales. Dave talked to Skip and Mike back in 2011.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
